participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Emily is excited about her upcoming motherhood and enjoys learning new things through books and documentaries.
participant_1.background: i am pregnant with my first child. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and playful, Jake loves spending time with dogs and enjoys a carefree lifestyle that includes dancing and engaging in his interests.
participant_2.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i dance on the weekends.

content.text: Hey, are you here? What's up?
